result.reason: The RDP window should resize dynamically or support Smart Sizing when the container is expanded. Current behavior prevents this expected functionality.
result.approach: Investigate SmartSize property handling and RDP 8+ dynamic resolution update (DoResizeClient) to ensure the session scales or resizes with the window.
